author: jimmygchen
content: Looks like Prysm got stuck from 3977 and Lighthouse forked (3978) not long after that. We suspect it might be related to Lighthouse not supporting mplex (being revived now in https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/pull/4619), and therefore lighthouse can't communicate with other clients other than Prysm, so is now in it's own fork. We're looking to merge this fix to our deneb branch now.

author: arnetheduck
content: btw, for anyone interested in evaluating blst's runtime cpu detection on weird platforms, it's now part of nimbus' `unstable` branch which, incidentally, is also being used for devnet-8
